titles.title: My Life Is In Your Hands, Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
My life is in your hands, Lord.
My life is in your hands.
I was a ball of clay, just in need of the potter's hand.
Then you came into my life, and you mold me in your love.
My life is in your hands, Lord.
My life is in your hands.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: My need is in your hands, etc.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: My joy is in your hands, etc.
